Name: Autumn-Chess
About the game: The single player self-propelled chess game template and experimental works made by myself contain the basic elements of self-propelled chess game. Chess automatic combat system, chess handling and trading system, three in one upgrade system, also add money management system, population system and store system to the game. However, due to the lack of funds, the monster setting and ending screen were not done.
